title: Somewhat gamebreaking glitch
body:
hi, ive discovered a glitch or bug thing whenever i join a game, its not every game, but ever 1 in 5 or so games, ill search for a game, find a match, click accept, and i get sent back to the lobby screen, but i can hear the champs being selected and locked in aswell as the champ select music, but the lobby screen is still up. sometimes itll put me in the champ select after 40 seconds or so giving me very little time to choose a champ, but most of the time it just times out and it makes me skip the queue, resulting in those annoying wait times before games, im up to 15 minutes now. ( ill admit not all of them are because of the bug, but most are ) this is getting really annoying.
If yous could possibly look into this, thatd be awesome. or if anyone else is getting this problem have a geeze, post a fix, or any info.
Cheers.

replies.body: no this has happened to me so you  click accept right. say you inv others from friends list okay afte you click accept it takes you back to the inv page and then it stays there you click start game and it says you and so and so are un able to join queue as you are already in a game but your not this is one of the oldest bugs dw its not just happening to you and its really pissing me off now leavebusters 20 mins up to the last one and it does this so i have to restart my lpq #riotsortyourgameoutplz
Seems weird. What ISP you with?

It sounds like a connection issue, myself and a friend had this issue the other day

We saw the game pop, we clicked accept. It did nothing for about 8 seconds but it didnt kick us out. We got into the game and the timer was 8 seconds behind which meant my initial pick is the one i had to play because at 8 seconds left on the timer it went into prematch countdown
